body.name: L.O.L. Surprise! LOL Surprise Bubble Foam Lil Sisters Doll - Collectible Baby Sister Great Gift for Girls Age 4+
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 21 hrs 37 mins
features: BUBBLES BUBBLES EVERYWHERE: Introducing L.O.L. Surprise Bubble Surprise! These Lil Sisters are ready to swim in a sea of colorful bubbles that YOU create!
1 STEP TO BUBBLE PARTY: Simply pour water into the top of your ball and watch as the bubble reaction changes color and reveals your own collectible Lil Sister and surprises!
SPARKLY, SHIMMERING DETAILS: Each baby sis has a unique style with shimmering, sparkly details and accessories
WATER SURPRISE: Find Lil Swan Star and bathe her in cold water to see her color change!
o WARM WATER: Use warm water (98˚F) for best results!
COLLECT THEM ALL: Collect all 12 L.O.L. Surprise Bubble Surprise Lil Sisters for the ultimate bubble party!
body.description: Introducing L.O.L. Surprise Bubble Surprise Lil Sisters! These baby sisters are ready to swim in a sea of colorful bubbles that YOU create! Pour water into the top of your L.O.L. Surprise ball, then sit back and watch as the bubble reaction changes color and reveals your own collectible Lil Sister and surprises! These baby sisters have a blast playing both in and out of their sparkly bubbles. Find all the different ball and bubble colors, including the rare rose gold ball! Collect all 12 L.O.L. Surprise Bubble Surprise Lil Sisters for the ultimate bubble party! Complete your Bubble Surprise family with L.O.L. Surprise! Bubble Surprise Dolls, Pets, and Deluxe! LOL Surprise collectible dolls with stylish hair, fun to dress outfits and many detailed accessory pieces make a perfect toy and playset for kids including 4- to 7-year-olds and up girls and boys for imaginative pretend play! As birthday gifts and gift for any special occasion, dolls provide hours of social play with siblings and friends! From MGA Entertainment, creators of LOL Surprise fashion and collectible dolls, Rainbow High fashion dolls, Na Na Na Surprise dolls, Bratz fashion dolls, MGA's Dream Ella fashion dolls, MGA's Glitter Babyz baby dolls, Lalaloopsy, Poopsie Surprise girls dolls, Baby Born Surprise Baby Dolls and Collectibles, Little Tikes kids toys and many other favorite brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is tiny and cute
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is a LOL fan. She loved all the dolls. This is tiny be careful with the age suggested.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun way to reveal
reviews.reviewText: I bought each of my daughter's one of these bubble surprise dolls for Christmas, and they loved them. Make sure to remove the pastic from inside the ball before adding the warm water, or it won't work. We did these in the bathtub to make it easier to cleanup, and so they could see it easier. They bubbled up for much longer than I expected, and the dolls and their accessories were cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This was the best addition to any LOL set
reviews.reviewText: For the price, we picked this up for Christmas and it was one of the best played with presents, it's a mini sized LOL that comes with prizes inside and the ball is apart of the LOL set. Definitely worth getting if your child loves these things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Item came exactly as I ordered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy enough for 9 and 5 year old
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these for my 9 and 5 years olds. We received them yesterday and the only time they've stopped playing with them is when they went to sleep. They're tiny which I find to be more appealing the my daughter's because they aren't the typical LOL doll size. Mixing the bubble stuff up in the LOL ball was easy for both daughters with little to no mess at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my granddaughter. She loved it. She said "We are doing science." It brought joy and was exactly age appropriate. I would give as a gift. I loved the joy it brought.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024

reviews.reviewText: So cute. Perfect condition. Great value for money.
Only complaint is wishing they’re a couple bucks cheaper. But really for 10$ to distract a 7 years for a couple hours. How does one go wrong
